thread.title: Huge rat filmed running rings around KFC staff who stamp on it after it leaps into diner's lap
thread.title_full: Huge rat filmed running rings around KFC staff who stamp on it after it leaps into diner's lap

author: mirror
title: Huge rat filmed running rings around KFC staff who stamp on it after it leaps into diner's lap
text:
News Huge rat filmed running rings around KFC staff who stamp on it after it leaps into diner's lap WARNING: DISTRESSING FOOTAGE The rodent caused a commotion at a branch of the fast-food chain in Reading after leaping into a customer's lap as she ate her foods Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Horror as huge rat runs rings round KFC staff before they stamp on it Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A huge rat has been filmed scurrying around a KFC restaurant, running rings around staff as they desperately try to catch it. 
The rodent caused a commotion at a branch of the fast-food chain in Reading after leaping into a customer's lap as she ate her food. 
The critter eventually met its demise when an employee appeared to stamp on it. 
KFC shut down the restaurant after footage of the rat giving staff the runaround was viewed more than 200,000 times online. Read More Elderly woman starts crying after wetting herself in KFC when staff 'refused to let her use toilet' A staff member picks up some food packaging to scoop up the dead rat (Photo: Get Reading) 
Hasseb Lodhi, from Reading, filmed staff attempting to catch the rodent at KFC in Broad Street at 8.30pm on Saturday. 
The teenager said: "The rat came down from upstairs. 
"It jumped onto the table where three people were sat and then jumped onto this woman's lap. It then started running around and the woman was screaming. 
"It was running around for about 10 minutes, there were a lot of people in there and the person the rat jumped on was really frightened." 
He added: "The guy who caught it could have dealt with it a bit better, obviously it was a bit brutal. But at the end of the day he had to what he had to do." Read More Man orders KFC via Deliveroo only for his ex to deliver it - so she tells him to f*** off and flees with chicken The squash rat is scooped up and disposed of by staff (Photo: Get Reading) 
Footage of staff attempting to catch the rat went viral after the teen posted it to his Facebook page. 
It shows them chasing it around the restaurant before it is seen squashed beneath an employee's foot. 
Hasseb told Get Reading : "I thought I had set the video [to be seen by] friends only but when I woke up from my sleep I saw it had 20,000 views and within 24 hours it had around 200,000." 
The restaurant has been been temporarily shut down while KFC tackles the rat problem. Read More The absolutely ridiculous reason Donald Trump eats so much fast food The KFC branch in Reading has been temporarily closed down (Photo: Get Reading) 
A spokesman said: “We were shocked to see this and would like to apologise to any customers that were in the restaurant at the time. 
"As soon as we were made aware, we immediately closed the restaurant and brought specialists in to investigate. 
"They found there is an issue in the surrounding area, so the restaurant will now remain closed until we ensure the problem is resolved and there’s no further risk posed. 
"Incidents like this are extremely rare, and the restaurant itself was awarded a top rating of five stars on its most recent Environmental Health Office inspection.” Like us on Facebook
